argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | usgrafis.f | |- F = ( E |` { x e. dom E | N e/ ( E ` x ) } ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_usgrafilem1 | |- dom E = ( dom F u. { x e. dom E | N e. ( E ` x ) } ) |
\
 Lemma 1 for ~ cusgrasizeinds .  The domain of the edge function is the union of the arguments/indices of all edges containing a specific vertex and the arguments/indices of all edges not containing this vertex. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 4-Jan-2018.)
